original_text: The yoke of my transgressions is bound by his hand: they are wreathed, and come up upon my neck: he hath made my strength to fall, the Lord hath delivered me into their hands, from whom I am not able to rise up.
korean_text: 내 죄악의 멍에를 그의 손으로 묶고 얽어 내 목에 올리사 내 힘을 피곤하게 하셨음이여 내가 감당할 수 없는 자의 손에 주께서 나를 넘기셨도다

sentences.original_text: The yoke of my transgressions is bound by his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 죄의 멍에가 그의 손으로 묶였다

sentences.original_text: and come up upon my neck
he hath made my strength to fall
Lord hath delivered me into their hands
from whom I am not able to rise up
